content:
/>
XI.i.1.B.2.k
.
Disposition of Veteran NOD Data Prints
The system generates a Veteran NOD VID screen print when NOD processing results in a
new BIRLS record, or
NOD folder in BIRLS.
These prints should be destroyed in accordance with
VBA Letter 20-08-63, VBA Policy on Management of Veterans' and other Governmental Paper Records
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B  - System Information for Veteran Notice of Death (NOD) and Month of Death (MOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
